sense.gloss: to fly about, to flutter about, to flit about, to fly past each other

sdata.j: ↑侃侃諤諤↑↓かんかんがくがく↓の↑議論↑↓ぎろん↓が↑飛↑↓|と↓び↑交↑↓か↓う|ような↑会議↑↓かいぎ↓、といったことは↑最近↑↓さいきん↓はやらないのかね。
sdata.e: I wonder if they don't have meetings anymore where strong words fly and everyone goes at each other tooth and nail.
